_sText:
*** NEW VERSION - http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/126822 ***
*** NEW VERSION - http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/126822 ***

Created by Captain Nighthawk


This map was originally a small scheme, but it was abandoned so I decided to take it on. I turned the map into a concrete/modern themed jail map.

It was designed for the Ct's to be able to have full control over the t's, they can watch the t's from behind the cells to stop them from hiding :]
The map is currently being played on the Edgegamers Jailbreak server and does not lag with 40 players on.
There are 20 Ct Spawns and 40 T Spawns, this version was created for Edgegamers, but different versions can be arranged if you notify me.

**This map requires NOBLOCK as many of the games are in small areas and you could end up with t's stuck together**

Features
* Climb
* Disco
* Maze
* Games Area
* S4S
* Pool
* Heal
* Couch Room
* Sandcastle :)

Special Features
* There are secret spritetrails hidden around the map that use custom textures, (green and rainbows)
* A well designed Lockdown that locks each part of the prison down over a period of 3 minutes.
* A large sandcastle for the t's to play in

Minor Bugs
* The door in climb blocks the Ct's Vision from the walkway
* Some Walls stick out

Testers -

Phasexero
Roguesniper
Angeal
Lava
Enfiorce

v2 Will be released Shortly :]
